item.title: RXJS 基础
item.author: Jacob
item.description: 点击 fromEvent 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 let click$ = Rx.Observable.fromEvent(button, 'click'); click$.subscribe(e=>{ console.log(e) const span= document.createElement("span"); span.innerHTML = e.pageX result.appendChild(span) })
